Escalate to the WPM-team when staffing issues are going to cause significant delivery interruptions. WPM may possibly trigger people rotations from existing big and stable EPAM accounts, a search for candidates within Internal Mobility/Bench, considering other creative approaches to ensure staffing goes consistently with GDO/xBU business goals, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Needs to be complete \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"within two weeks\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", AND since the \\\"1.
